title: How do I block people after game in new client?
body: I posted here before when the client is at alpha stage, about how we needed that feature, but I didn't get a respond, so did you somehow remove that feature intentionally and think it's fun to take away the only weapon we can protect ourself from toxic players?

replies.body:
This doesn't seem to be enabled yet, unless they're already on your friends list.  I don't have any eta or details on this, so you may want to ask about it on the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards so the client devs can take a look.  You can use the legacy client to perform any blocks until then:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Hope that helps!
